MEDICAL_GROW.summary: It is not legal for medical marijuana patients to grow cannabis in Pennsylvania. The Pennsylvania Medical Marijuana Act and Department of Health regulations prohibit home cultivation, allowing only licensed grower/processors to cultivate cannabis. Patients must obtain medical marijuana exclusively from licensed dispensaries, and unauthorized cultivation is a felony offense punishable by up to five years in prison and a $15,000 fine.
